git init
git add .
git commit -m "feat:initial commit"
git remote add origin remoteurl

# remote url will be generated when you login into azure and follow deployment steps, one remote git url will get generated where we eed to push our code
# this url is generated by azure, and once we push our code at that location it will deploy the app with this code

git push origin master

# after pushing it will ask for username and password and that awill be aailable on azure-deployment credentials tab
# overview==>deployment center==>deployment credentials
